name: The Fixies Quest: Kids Riddles
description:
We develop and publish educational and fun games for children free (kids game for 2 3 year child and older). Our educational games for kids kindergarten are full of beautiful and colorful graphics, interactive games and interesting characters.
More of our educational object find and children games for 10 years free on our Google Play page: https://play.google.com/store/apps/dev?id=5319914182472753679

📩If you have any questions about smart games for brain kids we are waiting for your letters: contact.devgame@gmail.com
